title: How to Make a Pineapple Marinade

steps.headline: Combine the ingredients in a large bowl.
Store any unused marinade in an airtight container.
steps.description: Chill in the refrigerator up to 7 days.

steps.headline: Combine the ingredients in a medium pot.
Heat it over medium heat.
steps.description: Remove the mixture before it boils.

steps.headline: Use the marinade immediately.
steps.description: Chill the marinated meat in the refrigerator between 30 minutes to overnight.

text: Using Crushed Pineapple Combine the ingredients in a large bowl.  Use the marinade immediately.  Store any unused marinade in an airtight container. Chill in the refrigerator up to 7 days. Using Pineapple Juice Combine the ingredients in a medium pot.  Heat it over medium heat. Remove the mixture before it boils. Use the marinade immediately. Chill the marinated meat in the refrigerator between 30 minutes to overnight.
